meanings.sent1: The movie star wore a superfly outfit to the award show.
meanings.sent2: She always looks superfly in her fashionable clothes.
meanings.sent3: Everyone at the party admired his superfly hat.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was as superfly as her trendy sunglasses.
meanings.sent5: The superfly car turned heads as it drove down the street.

meanings.definition: A person who is very attractive or stylish.
meanings.sent1: He was known as the superfly of the school for his fashion sense.
meanings.sent2: The superfly at the party caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The superfly in the group always had the best outfits.
meanings.sent4: She strutted into the room like a superfly, commanding attention.
meanings.sent5: The superfly of the office always dressed to impress.

meanings.definition: To fly very high or fast.
meanings.sent1: The eagle can superfly through the sky with ease.
meanings.sent2: The superhero can superfly to rescue those in need.
meanings.sent3: The paper airplane attempted to superfly but crashed into the wall.
meanings.sent4: The rocket ship will superfly into outer space.
meanings.sent5: The athlete can superfly over hurdles with grace.
